name: Easter Egg Jump
description:
Play Easter Egg Jump - The Most Addictive Game of Year 2020.
Hyper casual game with one tap control. Control The Easter Eggs with one tap - Left or Right and save them to fall in helix maze.

Easter Egg Jump is the most popular and easy to play game of Helix Jumping ball category Game. The game with 20+ cool Eggs and 4 Monsters.

Features of Easter Egg Jump game.
- 4 Different Environment
- 16 Easter Eggs
- 4 Monsters
- 50 levels
- Rewarded Levels
- Easy to Difficulties with Speed.

How To Play Easter Egg Jump
Easter Egg Jump is very easy to play. All you need to rotate the helix with one tap finger and let egg fall to the base. Hoping on different colors on Helix will cause to game over.

How to Restart Game
With Rewarded ads, You can restart the game too
